name: mcp-datahub
description: Discover and explore data catalog metadata via the Model Context Protocol (MCP).
long_description: mcp-datahub is a Model Context Protocol server for DataHub, enabling AI assistants like Claude to explore data catalogs, discover datasets, understand data lineage, and access metadata. Search for data assets, retrieve schema information, explore glossary terms, and navigate data products - all through natural language conversations with your AI assistant.

tools.name: datahub_search
tools.description: Search for datasets, dashboards, pipelines, and other assets in the DataHub catalog

tools.name: datahub_get_entity
tools.description: Get detailed metadata for a DataHub entity by its URN

tools.name: datahub_get_schema
tools.description: Get the schema (fields, types, descriptions) for a dataset

tools.name: datahub_get_lineage
tools.description: Get upstream or downstream lineage for an entity

tools.name: datahub_get_queries
tools.description: Get SQL queries associated with a dataset

tools.name: datahub_get_glossary_term
tools.description: Get a glossary term definition and its related assets

tools.name: datahub_list_tags
tools.description: List available tags in the DataHub catalog

tools.name: datahub_list_domains
tools.description: List data domains in the DataHub catalog

tools.name: datahub_list_data_products
tools.description: List data products in the DataHub catalog

tools.name: datahub_get_data_product
tools.description: Get detailed information about a data product including its assets, owners, and domain

tools.name: datahub_list_connections
tools.description: List all configured DataHub server connections for multi-server environments

datahub_token.title: Access Token
datahub_token.description: DataHub personal access token for authentication

datahub_additional_servers.title: Additional Servers (JSON)
datahub_additional_servers.description: Optional: Add more DataHub servers as JSON. Example: {"staging": {"url": "https://staging.datahub.example.com/api/graphql", "token": "token"}}
